column3: â€œWriting as I burn.  I am currently in Seattle.  This flower smells great.  Very fruity with grape being the dominant scent.  Both times I have smoked this, I became sleepy, which was exactly why I purchased it.  It does the trick, and also gave me a sense of calm and happiness.  I really enjoy everything about this flower.  Its beautiful, smells great, and is a fantastic Indica.â€
â€œBlack 84 is a nice indica. Helpful with sleep,pain. great medicinal qualities.â€

â€œMy new night time sleep inducer. Just purchased this from Have a Heart Cafe in Seattle yesterday and is my new fav indica today. Great strain in glass bowls because of the great taste. Been smoking for years now and it takes a lot to knock me to sleep but after a few sessions with this strain, GOODNIGHT.â€

â€œThis is one of my very favorite indica stains; it's a very relaxing, de-stressing, and tasty strain. Great for a mellow Sunday afternoon on the couch or a late night treat to send you off to restful sleep. This is fairly strong stuff that makes whatever you're doing enjoyable, so long as it can be done in the prone position -- which is exactly where you'll end up; the batch I'm currently smoking is 30.4% Total Cannab...â€

â€œany strain cultivated for cancer patients should 1) get rid of any pain and relax the mind and body 2) ignite the appetite and rid you of nausea 3) make you feel good from head to toe 4) settle in and make you sleepy..Real, proper UW/84 black is a devine experienceâ€
â€œA very nice smoke, my partner and I regard it as 'the coffee' of marijuana. A nice after dessert smoke. 'Pleasant' is really the only way I regard this bud.â€
â€œpretty good.â€
â€œEverything you'd want an indica to doâ€

â€œFire Indica! Not sure how I hadn't heard of this strain before, but wow the high is definitely up there with the best. Very stoney, couch lock, pain relieving high that just gets more intense over the course of ten minutes or so before settling in. Top 10 favorite.â€

â€œdecent body high. 
feels good.
very relaxed.â€

â€œFound this as UW Black and impressed on how strong this little indicia strain actually is. Earthy-Woody taste with a piney aroma, super relaxing for both mind & body. At first it was a bit harsh but as it burns it mellows out, personally I found it best topped with a bit of rich wax/oil and it quickly went to lights out".â€"
â€œI got this strain due to the high THC content (24%). The flavor is not the best, but the head high is good.â€
â€œpretty good.â€
â€œEverything you'd want an indica to doâ€

â€œOne of my favorite night time strains. Smooth and flavorful, kicks in fast. Not only helps with my insomnia but also with my back pain. Try this if you're looking for something to treat pain and give you a good nights sleep.â€
â€œReal heavy stuff, but great if you're just trying to crash after a long day. It has a lemony taste to it too. Definitely something I'd buy again.â€
â€œSuper potent and uplifting. Great strain.â€
â€œThis provides a nice, relaxing high. Great for at night use. The flavor is smooth and a little sweet.â€
â€œExcellent strain. Vaped it from a volcano. No Anxiety, no paranoia. Made me feel relaxed and happy. Great bedtime strain, as it will make you sleepy. I will smoke her again.â€
â€œRecommended by an employee at GreenTheiry, this sent from heaven strain has me totally relaxed after a dayful of angry people. Highly recommended for its ability to dissipate the day away.â€
â€œone of the best strains taken from UWâ€

â€œStrong heavy Indica strain.  This one hit right to the head with a nice heavy high that finished the night off right.  I hit the couch and sank right into it... I should have no issue going right to sleep tonight.â€
â€œgood head high, got fairly hungry and tired.â€
â€œBotanimax Solventless Rosin has an black 84 rosin that is like a gooey anchor.â€
â€œsounds dankâ€
â€œSmoked it with a black friend who went to UW and was born in 84. Life is completeâ€
